text: In order to check if `genfromtxt` failed in `csv_to_array`, we checked that the resulting array is full of nan values. This may fail even when the resulting array is OK. This PR makes this check rely on the `loose=False` option of `genfromtxt` that raises a `ValueError` in case of a problem.
title: Robustify csv_to_array

text: In order to check if `genfromtxt` failed in `csv_to_array`, we checked that the resulting array is full of nan values. This may fail even when the resulting array is OK. This PR makes this check rely on the `loose=False` option of `genfromtxt` that raises a `ValueError` in case of a problem.
title: Robustify csv_to_array
Pull request merge from AlexandreAbraham/nilearn:better_csv_to_array to nilearn/nilearn:master

text: Adding tests would be nice, given that we raise a `ValueError` when array has `nan` values or something similar.
